body.name: Upgrade Wireless Retro Game Console Stick, ZeroStory Retro Video Game Stick Built in 20000+ Games with 15 Emulators, 4K HDMI Output with 2 2.4G Wireless Controllers (64GB Memory Card)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 24 - 27 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
FREE pickup Monday, February 26 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Built-in 20000+ Classic Games】This wireless TV game console built in 20000+ rich games, is pre-install 15 emulators, and pack with 64GB TF card. No need to download and install by yourself, no internet required, you can play 20000+ classic games just by connecting to the TV.

【4K HDMI Gaming Experience】4K HD HDMI output, 1080P HD quality, equipped with expanded HDMI cable, suitable for different monitors, can be connected to TV/computer/TV set-top Box /PC/Laptop/Projector, perfect to meet your high resolution and game configuration needs. Please make sure your screen has an HDMI input port so that the console can connect to your TV/TV set-top box. The retro game stick also support saving game progress, perfect for gaming at any time.

【2 2.4GHz Wireless Controllers】With 2 PCS 2.4GHz wireless controller adapters, the connection is stable and almost zero latency, The Video Game Console supports 2 people to play games at the same time, avoiding the interference of wires while gaming.

【Plug & Play Retro Game Console Stick】Connect the gamepad to the power supply, then plug it into the TV, and adjust the TV power to the HD channel to display the game list screen on the TV. The steps are as follows :1. Connect the HD output of the TV 2. Insert the built-in TF game content card 3. Using the charging adapter to connect the power supply will turn on automatically. (2 wireless controllers require 4 AAA batteries, not included in the package)

【Fantasic Gift to Kids/Adults】Plug and play video games console not only bring fun play time to kids, they also evoke fond childhood memories and release the stress of life for adults in the 80s and 90s. Ideal gift for children and adults on birthdays, Thanksgiving day, Christmas day or any occasion. If you come across any problems during playing, please contact us through the Information of Amazon Buyers and Sellers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: When I was a kid, I loved playing video games. This little console contains many of the games I used to play as a kid, and even though they are outdated, they make me miss them so much. Although some games can also be played on phones or tablets, but that feeling is different. I'm very happy and like it very much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient Game Station
reviews.reviewText: Easy plug and play, contains a tons of childhood games we were playing. It will be better if the output image quality can be adjusted and compatible with the high resolution monitor or TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Proof that it's not as easy as someone thought
reviews.reviewText: I love retro gaming, and I really really wanted to love this stick. In principle, it's perfect, plug into TV, retro games, awesome.Reality is no see great. The picture is terrible, seems to use some kind of onboard AI upscaling tech which just makes everything look bubbly. 50% of the games are repeats and another 20% are exclusively in Japanese. The remaining 30% are unplayable because the onboard hardware isn't strong enough to run a super Nintendo rom without studdering to a rediculous degree. Then the ones that do work as so sped up that you can't play those either cause it's like playing on fast forward. OK maybe I'm being unkind. The fighting games are fine so like 10% of the games are playable. But good luck with the controller cause it's not SNES layout and it's not reprogramable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t work with modern TVs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I can’t believe that this little machine helped me bring back my childhood memories, and it also comes with an infinite controller. This price is very affordable!

reviews.reviewText: it's interesting and fun to play at weekend。

reviews.reviewText: My husband bought this. Him and our boys that love to game and are 16 and 19 came out last night to join him and play ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy plug and play, contains most of the game that I wanted
reviews.reviewText: Easy plug and play device. It contains most of the childhood games that I used to play and was looking for very long time. Comes with two controllers for multi player games. I am enjoying it.
